hero.paragraph1: Every planted tree is a beacon of hope for future generations.
hero.paragraph2: Vraksh Mitra Sanstha is a campaign dedicated to protecting the environment and planting trees.ðŸŒ¿

ourmission.heading: Our Mission
ourmission.paragraph: Our mission is to enrich the Earth with greenery, purify the air, and combat climate change. The goal of Vraksh Mitra Sanstha is not just to plant trees, but to revive and sustain greenery. We envision a world where every individual connects with nature and actively contributes to its protection. Through tree plantation, tree conservation, and environmental awareness, we are building a clean, safe, and balanced future for generations to come.

projects.heading: Our Major Projects
projects.desc1: Our first step towards greenery is for every family to plant a sapling.
projects.desc2: Teaching children to plant trees and love nature.
projects.desc3: Work on rainwater harvesting and water conservation.

aboutcontent.heading: Vraksh Mitra Sanstha
aboutcontent.paragraph1: We are an environmental conservation organization dedicated to planting trees, caring for them, and raising awareness about nature. Our goal is to create a green, clean, and healthy future for generations to come.

aboutfounder.name: Yogendra Singh
aboutfounder.paragraph1: The Vriksha Mitra Sanatha was founded by environmentalist and social worker Mr.
aboutfounder.paragraph2: He firmly believes that every individual can contribute to the conservation of nature. Under his guidance, all the members of Vriksha Mitra are successfully running this campaign. Their objective is: *Every person should plant a tree and make the earth green again.

aboutourmission.heading: Our Mission
aboutourmission.paragraph: Our mission is to enrich the Earth with greenery, purify the air, and combat climate change. The goal of Vraksh Mitra Sanstha is not just to plant trees, but to revive and sustain greenery. We envision a world where every individual connects with nature and actively contributes to its protection. Through tree plantation, tree conservation, and environmental awareness, we are building a clean, safe, and balanced future for generations to come.

ourvision.heading: Our Vision
ourvision.paragraph: We envision a world where every individual lives in harmony with nature, protects the environment, and promotes greenery. Our goal is to create a sustainable future where trees not only benefit the environment but also empower communities. We want tree plantation to be more than just an activityâ€”it should become a movement that inspires people to be aware of and responsible toward nature.

ourjourney.heading: Our Journey
ourjourney.desc1: The first plantation of the organization was held on 20 January 2019. Since then, weekly plantations have been ongoing.
ourjourney.desc2: Tree plantation campaign conducted throughout the urban area.
ourjourney.desc3: Environmental education provided to children in schools.
ourjourney.desc4: Launched initiatives to promote rainwater harvesting and water conservation awareness.
ourjourney.desc5: Now we can track the growth of every tree online.

joinsecton.paragraph: You can become part of our mission and contribute to environmental conservation. Let's make the Earth green together.

volunteer.heading: Our Volunteers
volunteer.paragraph: Meet the people who are growing a greener tomorrow.

donate.heading1: Support our mission through volunteer work.
donate.paragraph1: The mission of Vriksha Mitra Sanstha is not just to plant trees but to raise environmental awareness and promote collective efforts. If you wish to contribute your time and effort, you are equally valuable to us.
donate.option5: â€¢ Participate in cleaning and conservation campaigns
donate.option6: â€¢ Participate in environmental awareness programs
donate.paragraph2: Your service for a few hours can give life to a plant. Let's make the Earth green together.
donate.thankyou: Your time and effort are our greatest contribution, thank you for your support!

contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.paragraph1: Vriksha Mitra Sanstha is a social movement dedicated to environmental conservation and awareness.
contact.paragraph2: Our mission is to plant as many trees as possible to make nature green.
contact.paragraph3: If you also wish to join this movement and contribute, please send your message below.
contact.paragraph4: Your suggestion, cooperation, and participation strengthen our mission even further.
